title: My PC is restarting in loading screen
body:
Hello guys ! 
I have a little problem here.
When i want to play a game, i'm picking my role and when i have to enter into the login screen my pc is restarting :/ {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} .
I reinstalled the game and it didn't work....
Can you tell me guys what's the problem?

replies.body: Your PC restarting could be a security precaution caused by a driver or hardware failure like overheating.  I recommend reaching out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look into this with you individually.  We'll reply back asap!
